name: Impure Galaxy
description:
IMPURE GALAXY 

Impure galaxy is a turn-based strategy game with shooting game elements. 

Take a journey with 3 mutated ships - Dark Phoenix, Harpy and Kraken to conquer the galaxy for what they have done to you.

If it becomes difficult, upgrade your ships with the mutagens in the space station.
Unleash the galaxy from creepy things, and experiments that made you what you are.

DEVELOPMENT

Game is made in pure C with SDL, and its developed by Misters Pixels. Most of the assets, in the game, are made by us. 

PLATFORMS
For now only on windows!

HOW TO PLAY

Extract folder from .zip file wherever you want and start .exe file from the folder, enjoy!

NOTES

Game has some minor bugs and it's not perfectly polished as we wanted it to be,
so it might get some updates in the future!

We are looking forward for any feedback so we can improve our games in the future, thank you for playing!
